overview: Hugo (Hugo Tara), a young Brazilian on vacation in Paris has booked online a room homestay. Edouard (Edouard Scott), the owner with very pronounced tastes for domination, will offer Hugo a discount on the price if the latter agrees to get on his sling. Meanwhile Mathieu (Mathieu Ferhati), a handsome Parisian with a head in the air, saw his debauched life with one of his lovers (Andr√© Madd) whom he adores to "tie up". But when Mathieu meets Hugo it's immediately love at first sight. What's better in the morning of a night of intense love than to be awoken by a good fuck and hot croissants?
title: Fuck & Breakfast
